scenes.visual_description: Vibrant, digital comic book art style. Close-up on a photo with harsh black borders, looking like a poorly framed artwork.  A giant, cartoony eraser bounces menacingly towards it.
scenes.narration: Ugh, these black borders are ruining my pics!

scenes.visual_description: Dynamic, comic book style. The eraser slams down on the borders, creating a puff of colorful, digital smoke.
Clean, vibrant digital comic book art. The photo is now perfectly borderless, glowing with a soft inner light.  The eraser gives a thumbs up.
